data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Hair Extension Set
data.detailed_description:
A set of equippable hair extensions to give your whole party a fresh new style.

Noble Twin Tails x 10
Cute Side Curl x 10
Eastern Bun x 10
Bun Twin Tails x 10
Fluffy Twin Tails x 10
Side Pony Tail x 10
Bomber Fro x 10
Rockin' Mohawk x 10
Wild Fluffy Ears x 10

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
